RelatedSentence: Head of Lebanese Forces party Samir Geagea announced that former Lebanese PM Saad al - Hariri suggested during their Sunday meeting in Paris the head of the Change and Reform Parliamentary bloc MP Michel Aoun as a consensus candidate to the presidential elections .

Head of Lebanese Forces party Samir Geagea announced that former Lebanese PM Saad al - Hariri suggested during their Sunday meeting in Paris the head of the Change and Reform Parliamentary bloc MP Michel Aoun as a consensus candidate to the presidential elections .
Geagea said that Aoun can not be a consensus candidate due to his ( Aoun 's ) previous practices and cooperation with Hezbollah .
